title: Dr. Leinnes' Personnel File
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Its 4 in the morning. Let's get this shit out of the way.

My personnel file[[footnote]] How creative. Another Mary Sue self insert[[/footnote]]

> **IDENTIFIER:** Dr. Neil Leinnes, PhD.
> 
> **SAFETY ACCESS:** Level IV Clearance
> 
> **FUNCTION:** Applied Metaphysics Senior Researcher
> 
> **CHRONOLOGY:** Born 12/1/1984 in Snowfield, Nevada, Dr. Leinnes was recruited out of University and joined the [[[experiment-log-914|SCP-914]]] project. Following an incident in which he terminated an anomalous object, Dr. Leinnes was transferred to Site-94 where he remained and eventually rose to Senior Researcher.
> 
> **QUOTATION:** "I get a whole personnel file all to myself?"


The moment you[[footnote]]Who?[[/footnote]] were waiting for. My SCPs!

> **[[[SCP-7393]]]**: The Definition of a Human Being[[footnote]]My first and written for Coldpostcon. Sucks ass. May rewrite it. Alex Thorley is my little blorbo.[[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//Description: Chamber is empty.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7967]]]**: We Have No Shepherds[[footnote]]Something I like. Just a short creepy piece. Totally didn't rip off EoD or 2718.[[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//This energy tends to dissipate shortly after the subject's death. SCP-7967 functions by tracking these events and using Wozny-Hellman Worship Sinks to absorb it successfully.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7278]]]**: Wrath of a Fae[[footnote]] Written for the F120A canon.[[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//It is for this reason that determining the true nature of SCP-7278 is extremely difficult and likely impossible.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7889]]]**: Lies and Slander[[footnote]] Written about Vikander-Kneed Techical Media. [[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//We at Vikander-Kneed Technical Media do not appreciate the slander that "nothing good ever comes from a VKTM tape." We hope you learn your lesson.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7609|KTE-7609-Ochre-Egochild]]]**: Casefile Template[[footnote]] Not a GOI Format. [[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//The GOC appears to have developed their own pataphysical eigenweapon.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7791]]]**: ｎｅｃｅｓｓａｒｙ ｅｖｉｌ[[footnote]]I consider this a failure, but I may rewrite it later. [[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//Actions taken by the Foundation such as genocide, torture, brainwashing, and abuse of sapient beings have historically been most effective in provoking SCP-7791 to action.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7790]]]**: Orientation[[footnote]]One of my best things. Coauthored with Abrethe. [[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//Welcome to the SCP Foundation. I'll be performing your orientation today.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7792]]]**: The Deletions[[footnote]]Written for goblincon.[[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//Personnel have described the hole as shaped like Dir. Rudolf Lingens.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7658]]]**: Forgettable, That's What We Are[[footnote]]Written for remixcon w/notgull.[[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//No Foundation departments exist to contain anomalies of this kind.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7355]]]**: Room 305 (Surgery)[[footnote]]Horror article (NielleiN was a month early edition)[[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//So, I have concluded from the evidence that that room is God and He wants me to survive for some purpose.//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7231]]]**: In Heaven[[footnote]]About the Scarlet King[[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//Are you sure you want to continue, Dr. Montauk?//[[/span]]

> **[[[SCP-7964]]]**: The Gate, Unguarded[[footnote]]A remix of Clef's Proposal[[/footnote]]
> ------
> [[span style="color:gray"]]//God is meant to be my light, but I see only darkness.//[[/span]]


Some real things about me![[footnote]]Who the fuck cares?[[/footnote]]

> I'm currently in college in [PERSONAL INFORMATION REDACTED] studying math. Did you know that Cauchy looks a lot like Putin?
> 
> I like Robotics, Tennis, Coding, and chocolate chip muffins.
> 
> I do not have any dreamers.[[footnote]]A reference to Discord? Really?[[/footnote]]

Some quotes about me!

> "NielleiN is an amazing writer who makes me feel inferior and ashamed that I ever thought I could compete with his massive talent" -{{Rounderhouse}}[[footnote]]My lawyers have advised me to make it clear that Rounderhouse never said this.[[/footnote]]

> "Has good taste (chainsawman profile picture)" -{{Yossipossi}}

> "Get lost you turds" -{{Grigori Karpin}}

And that's all the quotes![[footnote]]No one else cared enough to make a quote about you.[[/footnote]]

And here are some SCPs I like and think you should read.[[footnote]]So you're recomending better articles than your own?[[/footnote]] I'm doing 1 from each series.
> [[[SCP-184]]]
> [[[SCP-1425]]]
> [[[SCP-2798]]]
> [[[SCP-3005]]]
> [[[SCP-4012]]]
> [[[SCP-5666]]]
> [[[SCP-6820]]]
> [[[SCP-7900]]]
I think that's everything, bye!

**Addendum XXXX.01:** //Notes by Dr. Neil Leinnes//

> //Who the hell vandalized my personnel file?//-Dr. Neil Leinnes[[footnote]]It was me :p[[/footnote]]

[[footnoteblock]]

[[div class="footer-wikiwalk-nav"]]
[[=]]
<< [[[SCP-XXXW]]] | SCP-XXXX | [[[SCP-XXXY]]] >>. Why is this even here? I thought the meta joke was that you were vandalizing your AA's personnel file, but then why is this here. For that matter, who am I? Am I you or just some random consciousness making snarky comments and insulting you in footnotes. Did you even think about it....
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box |author=NielleiN]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]
author: NielleiN
